title: At The Hague, Israel Mounted a Defense Based in an Alternate Reality
description:
Israel’s rebuttal against charges of genocide was as weak in offering documented facts as South Africa’s case was powerful.

The post At The Hague, Israel Mounted a Defense Based in an Alternate Reality appeared first on The Intercept.

title: OpenAI Quietly Deletes Ban on Using ChatGPT for “Military and Warfare”
description:
The Pentagon has its eye on the leading AI company, which this week softened its ban on military use.

The post OpenAI Quietly Deletes Ban on Using ChatGPT for “Military and Warfare” appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Israel Bombed an Al Jazeera Cameraman — and Blocked Evacuation Efforts as He Bled to Death
description:
A new, in-depth timeline of efforts to help Samer Abu Daqqa reveals that Israel was repeatedly pressed to allow for his rescue, but kept emergency crews at bay for hours.

The post Israel Bombed an Al Jazeera Cameraman — and Blocked Evacuation Efforts as He Bled to Death appeared first on The Intercept.

title: No Safe Place in Gaza
description:
Humanitarian relief activist Amed Khan describes the worsening crisis on the ground in Gaza.

The post No Safe Place in Gaza appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Biden’s Strikes in Yemen Are Unconstitutional, Bipartisan Members of Congress Say
description:
The attacks against the Iran-backed Houthis stoked fears of U.S. involvement in a regional conflagration.

The post Biden’s Strikes in Yemen Are Unconstitutional, Bipartisan Members of Congress Say appeared first on The Intercept.
